item.title: A killer ride
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: From The Disney Blog: "Sad news to report today. A second fatality in less than a year of a guest who complained of feeling ill after riding Epcot's Mission: Space attraction. This time a 49 year old woman from Germany was reportedly ill after riding the g-force intensive space simulator. She was transported to a hospital and later died. There are some reports that she may had suffered from some pre-existing conditions." Read the whole article. (Link courtesy of BoingBoing - Subscribe to BoingBoingâ€™s blog via Blog Buzz Machine)
